taskTitle: Document and test agent.lock enforcement for Golden Loop

subtasks.description:
Implement: Document and test agent.lock enforcement for Golden Loop

Add coverage and doc notes for .openagents/agent.lock: how lock is created/checked, how to recover stale locks, and how the loop should abort when a running PID is detected. Include test plan or harness to validate lock behavior.

Document: Document and test agent.lock enforcement for Golden Loop

Add appropriate documentation/comments.
